ActPublic Service Employment Act
PrecisReppointment of STEPHEN KAKFWI of Yellowknife, Northwest Territories, as a special adviser to the Prime Minister, to serve as a member of the Independent Advisory Board for Supreme Court of Canada Judicial Appointments, to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years.
